function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of unproven materials for antiviral applications","Impact":"Ineffective protection against virus propagation, false sense of security","Mitigation":"Conduct thorough testing and validation in controlled environments before mass application","Technologies":"Material testing, controlled environment testing","People":"General public, healthcare workers, facility managers","Owner":"Researchers, manufacturers, regulatory bodies"},{"Description":"Variability of biocidal activity of graphene-based materials","Impact":"Inconsistent protection against virus propagation, potential for uneven disinfection","Mitigation":"Develop standardized application guidelines and testing procedures, provide training on proper application","Technologies":"Standardization protocols, training materials","People":"Facility managers, maintenance staff, healthcare workers","Owner":"Industry associations, regulatory bodies, manufacturers"},{"Description":"Limited understanding of the long-term effectiveness of graphene-based surface coatings against SARS-CoV-2","Impact":"Potential for decreased efficacy over time, uncertainty in sustainable protection","Mitigation":"Long-term field testing and monitoring, continuous research and development","Technologies":"Long-term monitoring tools, research and development facilities","People":"General public, facility managers, healthcare workers","Owner":"Research institutions, manufacturers, regulatory bodies"}]}
